alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Jackson; La Crosse; Monroe; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:18PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Buffalo, northeastern La Crosse, southwestern Jackson, northwestern Monroe and southern Trempealeau Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 918 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of North Bend to 7 miles east of Fountain City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cataract around 930 PM CDT. North Bend around 945 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Melrose, Shamrock, Lock And Dam 5 A, The Black River Falls Airport, Dodge, Beach Corners, Perry Creek Recreation Area, Thimble Park and Peacock Hill. People attending the Trempealeau County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 119 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Jackson; La Crosse; Monroe; Trempealeau
